title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 11 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 11 2022
description:
Jussie Smollett outburst at sentencing for race hoax, social media never took down inaccurate Biden, Harris tweets in favor of Smollett. Clay and Buck say this just created a greater racial divide than there already was in the race victim-obsessed media and nation. March 11th, 2020: The day covid exploded on the scene, NBA game in Oklahoma City was cancelled, starting the lockdown. Biden announces new sanctions on Russia, but what about the planes to Ukraine? White House briefs TikTok stars on Ukraine. March 11th: The day the covid lockdown began. Clay thinks they'll do a documentary called "March 11, 2020" one day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
